 --header-title: "Gooday's Pixel Art";

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

= [[image under_vegas.png]]

-----

> **HOUSE:** I'll put my soul on the table. But it means I get to pick the game.
> 
> **PLUTO:** That's fair.
> 
> **HOUSE:** Magic the Gathering.
> 
> **PLUTO:** What? No. Pick a real fucking game.

-----

**Subject:** [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-4661 SCP-4661] -- Sin City written by [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/rounderhouse-s-author-page ROUNDERHOUSE]

**Commentary:** One of Rounder's earlier works on the wiki SCP-4661 presented a fantastic location that I personally can't get enough of. It has absolutely wonderful characters and the writing itself is extremely fun. In this piece, I tried to encapsulate the feeling of UnderVegas, with demons, gambling, and hellfire being prominent in the drawing. 

**Time Taken:** 2h 59m

**Program Used:** 8bit Painter

**Canvas Size:** 128x128
